decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers Proposed Elevations and Proposed Floorplans.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 1 (2012) and Part 2 (2020), and the London Plan (2021).

The outbuilding hereby approved shall only be used for the purpose(s) stated on the application form and approved drawings. It shall not be used for purposes such as a living room, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, study, as a separate unit of accommodation or for business purposes.

To avoid any future undesirable fragmentation of the curtilage or the creation of a separate residential use, so as to protect the amenity of adjoining residential properties in accordance with DMHB11 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020).

The outbuilding hereby approved shall only be used for the purpose(s) stated on the application form as a garage and  it shall not be used for purposes such as a living room, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, study,  as a separate unit of accommodation or for business purposes.

To avoid any future undesirable fragmentation of the curtilage or the creation of a separate residential use, so as to protect the amenity of adjoining residential properties in accordance with Policy DMHB11 of the HIllingdon Local Plan - Part Two (2020).
description: (Retrospective application) changes to existing outbuilding appearance.
